item.title: 3値論理

item.title: bensadeh/tailspin: ? A log file highlighter
item.description: tailspin works by reading through a log file line by line, running a series of regexes against each line. The regexes recognize patterns like dates, numbers, severity keywords and more. tailspin does not make any assumptions on the format or position of the items it wants to highlight.
